SourceType.summary: Identifies the record's type in the originating system.

FreeText.summary: A text property which can be used at your discretion.

FreeDecimal.summary: A decimal property which can be used at your discretion.

FreeBoolean.summary: A boolean property which can be used at your discretion.

FreeDate.summary: A date property which can be used at your discretion.

AppointmentId.summary: The internal appointment id. Do not rely on its existence. Use AppointmentNo instead.

AppointmentNo.summary: The external identifier for this appointment.

ResourceNo.summary: Gets or sets the resource number.

Body.summary: Gets or sets the body content.

Locked.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item is locked.

TimeMarker.summary: Gets or sets the time marker.

Pin.summary: Gets or sets the pin indicator.

UriDescription.summary: Gets or sets the description of the URI.

SentFromBackOffice.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the request was sent from back office.

Importance.summary: Gets or sets the importance level.
